STR.string: {FONT name=fntHeadline}{COLOR r=250 g=230 b=210}Level 10{/COLOR}{/FONT} {INDENT dent=10}Style Mastery skills can be learned by spending 10 points on a single style. After learning a Style Mastery skill, you can learn the skills of other styles. Combine the skills of different styles to develop your own unique character class.{/INDENT} {ALIGN hor=center}{BITMAP name=guidebook_lv10_skill_d w=287 h=160}{CR}{ALIGN hor=center}Style Mastery: Defender {ALIGN hor=center}{BITMAP name=guidebook_lv10_skill_b w=287 h=160}{CR}{ALIGN hor=center}Style Mastery: Berserker {ALIGN hor=center}{BITMAP name=guidebook_lv10_skill_c w=287 h=160}{CR}{ALIGN hor=center}Style Mastery: Cleric {ALIGN hor=center}{BITMAP name=guidebook_lv10_skill_s w=287 h=160}{CR}{ALIGN hor=center}Style Mastery: Sorcerer

{FONT name=fntHeadline}{COLOR r=250 g=230 b=210}Level 10{/COLOR}{/FONT} {INDENT dent=10}Style Mastery skills can be learned by spending 10 points on a single style. After learning a Style Mastery skill, you can learn the skills of other styles. Combine the skills of different styles to develop your own unique character class.{/INDENT} {ALIGN hor=center}{BITMAP name=guidebook_lv10_skill_d w=287 h=160}{CR}{ALIGN hor=center}Style Mastery: Defender {ALIGN hor=center}{BITMAP name=guidebook_lv10_skill_b w=287 h=160}{CR}{ALIGN hor=center}Style Mastery: Berserker {ALIGN hor=center}{BITMAP name=guidebook_lv10_skill_c w=287 h=160}{CR}{ALIGN hor=center}Style Mastery: Cleric {ALIGN hor=center}{BITMAP name=guidebook_lv10_skill_s w=287 h=160}{CR}{ALIGN hor=center}Style Mastery: Sorcerer
